books.title: संपूर्ण चाणक्य नीति
books.author: Manoj Publication
books.description: If a biography is read before describing the policy of a miraculous personality like Chanakya, it will become easier to understand his policy. That's why Chanakya's biography is given earlier in this book. It is not a scripture, but a summary of the experiences of the entire worldly life. It is as relevant today, as it was 2000 years ago. Chanakya's policy which makes life easier also provides proper answers to all the questions of life.

books.title: Gulamgiri
books.author: Mahatma Jyotiba Phule
books.description: Written by Mahatma Jotirao Phule and published in the year 1873, the book “Gulamgiri” highlights the problems related to the varna and caste system. He signifies the importance of education and equality in society. He has examined the scriptures in this work logically. He engages in question-and-answer exchanges with the fictional character Dhondirao. His work brings readers to reality.

books.title: Indian Polity
books.author: StudyIQ Publications
books.description: Indian Polity Book 2023 launched by Study IQ Publications aims to address the syllabus of Indian Polity holistically from the UPSC Civil Services Examinations perspective. The book has been updated as per the latest examination pattern and is also suitable for all competitive examinations. The book has been prepared by experienced faculties and subject-matter experts, keeping in mind the challenges faced by the students while preparing for competitive exams.
